players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie was killed last night, and no one has said anything yet. Diana, why have you been silent? We need to figure out who might be the detective or a threat quickly."
You: "I agree we need to talk. Diana, your silence is suspicious. Bob, what are your thoughts on Charlie's death?"
Bob: "Silence can be a strategy, but it can also raise suspicion. Diana, if you’re town, now’s the time to speak up. Alice, do you have any leads or thoughts on who might be the detective?"
Diana: "I have information that Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and found evidence confirming his role."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why didn't you reveal your role immediately? This feels like a desperate claim after being called out for silence."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
